# submitEvents(_:)

**Instance Method**

Submits electrical load events to be used by EnergyKit to generate energy insights.

## Declaration

```swift
func submitEvents<Event>(_ events: [Event]) async throws where Event : ElectricalLoadEventProtocol
```

## Parameters

- **events**: An array of [doc://com.apple.energykit/documentation/EnergyKit/ElectricalLoadEventProtocol] conforming  load events to send.

## Discussion

The submission may contain events for multiple devices. The system throws [doc://com.apple.energykit/documentation/EnergyKit/EnergyKitError/invalidLoadEvent] if a load event is submitted for an incorrect [doc://com.apple.energykit/documentation/EnergyKit/EnergyVenue] or if it’s submitted by an iPhone, iPad, or Mac that didn’t fetch the corresponding [doc://com.apple.energykit/documentation/EnergyKit/ElectricityGuidance].
title: submitEvents(_:)
